description: This ring-shaped cake originated in northern Germany and is now popular all over the world. It is traditionally a simply flavoured cake that is dusted with icing sugar or drizzled with icing before serving.
name: Vanilla Bundt Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For the icing, place the double cream in a bowl. Whisk in the icing sugar and vanilla extract, gradually, until thick. Pour it over the cake. Serve with raspberries, if desired.
